title: Wake Me Up
lyrics:
You get up so early
It's darker than it's light
And you don't wanna see me
Paranoid
Making me feel guilty
Just like you home all along

Trap me with your body

Wake me up



Caption this

The problem is

We hesitate

Find out what you're hating

Let's be straight

And never say

How we are absolutely failing



Someone call it now

And pull me away

I'm just waking up and all I wanna say is

We are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

Yeah we're absolutely failing

(Yeah we're absolutely failing)



Everything is blurry

Turbulent then calm

Teeth are sinking deeper

Kill me first

Wind me up the wrong way

Edible wasn't your worst

Choosing up the flavour

Wake me up



Caption this

Thee problem is

What we do underneath the table

And trouble is

That ignorance is who we are

Absolutely blameless



Someone call it now

And pull me away

I'm just waking up and all I wanna say is

We are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

Yeah we're absolutely failing

We have got so much, so much to learn

What am i missing? What is it you've heard?

'Cause we are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

Yeah we are absolutely failing

Wake me up



Ahh... What are you waiting for?

'Cos I... Have put you out of my head

Why do we always pretend that we can only be friendly

I'd forgotten to mention it



Someone call it now

And pull me away

I'm just waking up and all I wanna say is

We are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

Yeah we're absolutely failing

Wake me up

We have got so much, so much to learn

What am i missing? What is it you've heard?

'Cause we are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

Yeah we are absolutely failing



We are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

We are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

We are, we are, we are, we are, yeah

Yeah we are absolutely failing

Wake me up
